item.description:
Celebrate "BEING"!

When working towards your desires, what's your preferred approach?
"Have-Do-Be" or "Be-Do-Have" ?

You might be going "huh?!!?"

"Have-Do-Be" or "Be-Do-Have" refers to 2 major approaches or sequences to attaining a new state
or becoming something new.

One is rarely successful, the other powerfully aligned with the Law Of Attraction principles.

Join us to discuss and discover which approach you want to align with, to struggle no more,
and flow more easily & effortlessly to a great year in 2008!!

And yes, come share a toast with us to a wonderful FIRST YEAR TOGETHER as a treasured, light-hearted
Boston LOA Meetup community!

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Law of Attraction Meetup
